solution.text:
Temperature inside cold reservoir) = _{j}_ C = _{{j+273}}_ K
Temperature inside hot reservoir) = _{k}_ C = _{{k+273}}_ K
Coefficient of performance\((\alpha) = \frac {T_1}{T_2-T_1} = _{{trunc(Decimal( (j+273)/ (k-j)),2)}}_ \)

content.text: A refrigerator has to maintain an inside temperature of  _{j}_ C. If temperature outside is _{k}_ C, what is the coefficient of performance? (include up to 2 decimal places in your answer if necessary)
